## Section 10.1: `read_csv()`

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
cars_df <- read_csv(here("data/mtcarsex.csv"))
head(cars_df)

## fix the first two lines
cars_df <- read_csv(here("data/mtcarsex.csv"),
                    skip = 2,
                    na = c("NA", "", " ", "-999"))

read_csv(here("data/mtcarsex.csv"), na = c("NA", "-999"), skip = 2) |>
  spec()

cars_df <- read_csv(here("data/mtcarsex.csv"),
                    skip = 2,
                    na = c("NA", "", " ", "-999"),
                    col_types = cols(
                      mpg = col_double(),
                      cyl = col_factor(),
                      disp = col_double(),
                      hp = col_double(),
                      drat = col_double(),
                      wt = col_double(),
                      qsec = col_double(),
                      vs = col_factor(),
                      am = col_factor(),
                      gear = col_double(),
                      carb = col_double()
                    )) |>
  slice(-c(1:2))
cars_df
```
